title: Om shrIm aim krIm
sahitya:
Om hrIm aim krIm shuddha shakti cidrUpiNi


anupallavi

  kAmASI tripurasundari kAtyAyani bAlAmbikE


caraNam 1    aruNa kiraNa prakAshini antarAtma vikAsini
shubha mangaLa varadAyini shuddhAnanda pramOdini
    caraNam 2    tajjham takajham taLAngu tarikiTatOnm tattarikiTa dhimikiTa tOm
takajhaNU takajhaNU taLAngu tarikiTa takardhina takardhina dhimikiTa takatOm
